queries.query: You are an expert requirements engineer. Assign the given requirement to one of the following types: performance, function or operation. ### REQUIREMENT {1}
Estimate, in range 0-100, whether the requirement {1} makes sense

<%text>### Instruction:</%text>
 Consider the following requirements:
#REQUIREMENT 1
{1} Note: {2} 
#REQUIREMENT 2
{8} Note: {9}
#INSTRUCTION Estimate, in the range from 0 to 100, whether the two requirements have the same meaning. The value of 100 indicates that they are certainly a duplicate. The value of 0 indicates that they are unrelated. Begin your answer with the estimated value. Keep your answer short.
